mapper.insert: insert into doppio_cart_item(CANUM, PNUM, mnum , popid, cacount, cadate, caorder) values((select canum from doppio_cart where mnum=#{mnum}),#{pnum},#{mnum},#{popid},#{cacount},sysdate,'n')
mapper.select: select dci.canum,dci.mnum,dci.pnum,dpa.ptitle,dpa.pprice,dpa.pfile,dpa.psfile,dci.cacount,dci.popid,dpo.popprice,dci.cadate from doppio_cart_item dci join doppio_package dpa on dci.pnum = dpa.pnum join doppio_package_option dpo on dpo.popid = dci.popid where dci.mnum=#{mnum} and dci.caorder='n'
mapper.delete: delete from doppio_cart_item where canum=#{canum} and pnum = #{pnum} and caorder='n'
mapper.update: update doppio_cart_item set caorder='y', onum=#{onum} where canum=#{canum} and pnum=#{pnum} and caorder='n'
mapper.select: select canum from doppio_cart where mnum=#{mnum}
